definition: (of a child) apple of one's eye
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga

sentences.english: You neednt worry, my little treasure.
Well, dearie, you don't need to ask me.
sentences.chinese: 好的，宝贝，你不用再征求我的同意。

sentences.english: No longer would his darling’s candle be extinguished by his useless tears.
sentences.chinese: 宝贝女儿的蜡烛再也没有被他无用的眼泪熄灭过。

sentences.english: Wash me, cleanse me in the blood That flowed from Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 求你所流宝贝血，洗净我众罪孽。

sentences.english: Have a both husband and wife the old age son, see as the darling a baby.
sentences.chinese: 有一家夫妻俩老年得子，视为心肝宝贝。

sentences.english: He is willing and able put His treasure in your earthen vessels.
sentences.chinese: 他愿意，也能够把他的宝贝放在你的瓦器里。

sentences.english: Gorged with power, I grew blind to Pokemon being alive.
sentences.chinese: 因贪嗜权力，竟令小生对神奇宝贝之存活盲目不见。

sentences.english: Her mother replied, ''Of couse it is, dear.''
sentences.chinese: 她的妈妈告诉她，“当然是了，宝贝。”

sentences.english: Hey,my sweetheart,time to get up for school.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，宝贝儿，该起床上学了。

sentences.english: Her darling boy was to come back to her repentant and tender-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 她的宝贝孩子即将怀着悔罪和体贴的心回到她的身边。

sentences.english: Quiet mornings. Sing-a-long songs with my toddlers in the car.
sentences.chinese: 与我的小宝贝在车里唱一首悠长的歌。

sentences.english: He has that charisma, right, mami?
But I'm not gonna beg, so baby, come around to me.
sentences.chinese: 但我绝不会乞求，所以宝贝，带着爱快到我身旁。

sentences.english: They are very beautiful and lovey.
Have you been missing laughing babies and sneezing pandas?
sentences.chinese: 你以前错过看笑不乐知的小宝贝和打喷嚏的熊猫吗？

definition: erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
a dad (father of a young child)
(of a child) apple of one's eye
